mapper.select: select message_id, message, try_count, status, next_retry, create_time, update_time from broker_message_log bml where status = '0' and next_retry <= sysdate()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO broker_message_log ( message_id, message, try_count, status, next_retry, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{messageId}, #{message}, #{tryCount}, #{status}, #{nextRetry}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
